sentences.sContent: If you lift up a heavy rock, you may find a centipede living under it.
sentences.sContent_eng: If you lift up a heavy rock, you may find a centipede living under it.
sentences.sCn: 如果你举起一块大石，可能会发现底下有蜈蚣。

sentences.sContent: "To tell you the truth", said the centipede, "I do not manage them at all.
sentences.sContent_eng: "To tell you the truth", said the centipede, "I do not manage them at all.
sentences.sCn: “说实话，”蜈蚣说，“我根本就不打理它们。”

sentences.sContent: There was once a one-legged dragon who said to the centipede, "How do you manage all those legs?
sentences.sContent_eng: There was once a one-legged dragon who said to the centipede, "How do you manage all those legs?
sentences.sCn: 从前有一条独脚龙，它对蜈蚣说：“这么多腿你管得过来吗？

trans.tranOther: a small creature like a  worm  with a lot of very small legs
